VERIFICATION_TOKEN_CANCELLED: This verification link has been cancelled.

PASSWORD_RESET_TOKEN_CANCELLED: Password reset token has been cancelled

CITY_ACCESS_DENIED: You are not assigned to this city.

ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND: No account found with this email address. Please check your email or register for a new account.
ACCOUNT_INACTIVE: Your account is inactive. Please contact support for assistance.
INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
LOGIN_ERROR: An error occurred during login. Please try again later.

CITY_HEADER_IMAGE_NOT_FOUND: City does not have a header image

LISTING_UPDATE_DENIED: You can only update listings you created
